page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT
page.content: The USAF base at Woodbridge and the Forestry Commission are the two lar- gest employers in this area. Some 125 British people work on the Base in a variety of jobs; cleaners,maintenance, storemen, telephonists, librarians, etc., and ten locals work for the Forestry Commission. Other employment is found locally on farms and in the Prison Service at Hollesley Bay Colony. There is no unemployment in this particular area, and labour relations in all spheres are good. There are some Youth Training Scheme Participants employed on conservation work in the area.
